name: Denise Ann Crossan
goal: I am engaged by the School of Business,  Trinity College Dublin as an Adjunct Assistant Professor in Social Entrepreneurship  and I work in association with the Centre for Nonprofit Management in TCD.  We teach and carry out research in the areas of social innovation, social enterprise, social entrepreneurship nationally in Ireland and internationally in the UK and USA. Our goal is to better understand the characteristics, behaviours and mechanisms associated with social enterprise / entrepreneurial action in Ireland and internationally.
interests: Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Humanitarian Aid, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Youth
euInitiatives: GECES Expert Panel on Social Entrepreneurship and the EC Social Business Initiative
